name: Core API Release 31.3.0
description: We have released another version of the core! This core release brings an enhancement in Multi Factor Authentication.

ADDED.text: Added capability of sending RBA email alerts for unusual consumer behaviour to the Multi-Factor Authentication flows.
MFA token will expire if the consumer changes or reset the password when the Force Logout feature is enabled.

IMPROVED.text: Error message for error code 975 is improved
